FuncDef: This command is used to create or edit an event filter entry. Multiple entries may be created using uniqueentry-idnumbers. The -TiMOS implementation exits the filter on the first match found and executes the action in accordance with the action command.

ParaDef.Info: The entry ID uniquely identifies a set of match criteria corresponding action within a filter. Entry ID values should be configured in staggered increments so you can insert a new entry in an existing policy without renumbering the existing entries. Values-1 to 999.

ExtraInfo: Default: No event filter entries are defined. An entry must be explicitly configured.
